title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente.
Fry bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine everything and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Grill chicken until cooked.
Prepare tomato sauce with butter and cream.
Add chicken to sauce and cook for 10 minutes.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious Italian pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Spread tomato sauce over pizza dough.
Add mozzarella cheese and fresh basil.
Bake for 15 minutes until crispy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A creamy and savory Russian dish with beef and mushrooms.
steps: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in sour cream and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A healthy and colorful mix of stir-fried vegetables.
steps: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Stir-fry garlic in oil, then add vegetables.
Cook on high heat for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and serve hot.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with chocolate chips.
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix butter, sugar, and egg until creamy.
Add flour and chocolate chips, mix well.
Scoop onto baking tray and bake for 12 minutes.
